about.title: About Us
about.storyP1: SkinLab 011 is a modern beauty salon located in the heart of Podgorica. Our mission is to provide you with premium treatments using state-of-the-art equipment and premium cosmetic products.
about.storyP2: With a team of certified professionals and an individualized approach to each client, we are dedicated to helping you feel and look your best.

owner.name: Neda Vukobrat
owner.title: Founder & Owner
owner.bio: With over 10 years of experience in the cosmetics industry, Neda is dedicated to providing premium treatments and personalized care. Certified dermato-cosmetician with international certifications.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions

items.q: How long does a facial treatment last?
items.a: The average duration of a facial treatment is 60-90 minutes, depending on the type of treatment. Deep cleansing usually takes about 75 minutes, while hydration treatments take about 60 minutes.
Laser hair removal can cause a mild sensation of discomfort, similar to a rubber band snapping against the skin. Our devices have a built-in cooling system that significantly reduces discomfort.

items.q: How many laser hair removal treatments are needed?
items.a: For optimal results, we recommend 6-8 treatments at intervals of 4-6 weeks. The number of treatments depends on the body area and skin type.

items.q: How should I prepare for a treatment?
items.a: We recommend coming with clean skin without makeup for facial treatments. For laser hair removal, avoid sun exposure 2 weeks before the treatment.
Please cancel or reschedule your appointment at least 24 hours in advance. Late cancellations or no-shows may result in a charge of 50% of the treatment price.

items.q: Can I come without an appointment?
items.a: We recommend booking in advance to guarantee your appointment. However, if we have an available slot, we'll be happy to accommodate you.
We use premium professional cosmetic lines from renowned world brands. All products are dermatologically tested and suitable for different skin types.
Yes! We offer various treatment packages with significant discounts. Check our price list for package details or contact us for a personalized offer.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a: We accept cash, cards (Visa, Mastercard) and bank transfer. For treatment packages, we offer installment payment options.
Yes, there is public parking in the immediate vicinity of the salon. The salon is also well-connected by public transport - bus lines 3, 6, 11 and 19.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're happy to answer all your questions
